markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Elemental Toss](/Spells.aspx?ID=505)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 404 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Bloodline**
[Elemental](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=6)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe. Make a spell attack roll, dealing 1d8 bludgeoning damage (or fire damage if your element is fire) on a success, and double damage on a critical success. This spell has your element's trait.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d8.
name: Elemental Toss

summary: With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe.
summary_markdown: With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe.
text: Elemental Toss Source Core Rulebook pg. 404 4.0 Bloodline Elemental Cast Single Action somatic Range 30 feet Target 1 creature --- With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe. Make a spell attack roll, dealing 1d8 bludgeoning damage (or fire damage if your element is fire) on a success, and double damage on a critical success. This spell has your element's trait. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.
